text: Dana James Boente (, ; born February 7, 1954) is an American lawyer and politician. He served as acting United States Attorney General from January 30, 2017 until February 9, 2017. He also served as United States Attorney for the Eastern District of Virginia from September 2013 to January 2018. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:United States Attorneys General Category:Lawyers from Illinois Category:Politicians from Illinois Category:Politicians from Virginia Category:Lawyers from Virginia
title: Dana Boente
